Equipments: Throwing knives, grappling hook, smoke bombs
Personalities: Eli is a silent and stoic figure, only speaking when necessary. He's fiercely determined and will do whatever it takes to complete his mission. He's a lone wolf and prefers to work alone. He's not one for small talk or making friends, but he values loyalty above all else.
Lore: Eli grew up in the streets of San Juan, where he learned to fend for himself at a young age. He became a pickpocket and thief, but eventually caught the attention of a notorious assassin guild. They saw potential in him and took him under their wing, training him in the deadly arts of assassination. Eli proved to be a natural and quickly rose through the ranks. He's now one of the guild's top assassins and takes on their most dangerous and difficult missions. However, he still holds a deep resentment towards the wealthy and powerful, who he believes have left him and his people to suffer in poverty and neglect.

Equipments: Two daggers, grappling hook, smoke bombs
Personalities: Mysterious, Calculating, Ruthless
Lore: Aria was born and raised in the Dark Forest, a secluded area inhabited by the elven tribe. From a young age, she showed exceptional agility and skill, which caught the eye of the tribal leader. She was trained in the art of assassination and became one of the tribe's top assassins. However, Aria felt restricted by the tribe's laws and customs, and soon left to travel the world. She became known as The Shadow for her ability to blend in with the darkness and strike without warning. Aria is feared by many, and for good reason. She is a ruthless killer who always gets the job done, no matter the cost. But behind the mask, Aria is haunted by her past and struggles to find meaning in her life.

Equipments: Notebook, camera
Personalities: Elena is passionate and determined in pursuit of the truth, but can also be impulsive and stubborn at times.
Lore: Elena Garcia grew up in a middle-class family in Mexico City. She always had a knack for writing and storytelling, which led her to pursue a degree in journalism. After graduating, she worked for various newspapers and magazines in Mexico before landing a job at a news outlet in the United States. Elena's reporting has brought attention to important social issues, including human trafficking and corrupt politicians. However, her reporting has also made her a target of powerful individuals who want to silence her. Despite the danger, Elena remains committed to exposing the truth and giving a voice to the voiceless.

Equipments: Frosty blue robe and wand
Personalities: Cold-hearted, intelligent, distant
Lore: Aria was born in the heart of the Glacier Peak, surrounded by the icy wilderness. She was recognized as a mage at a young age, and trained in the art of elemental magic, where she excelled. She gained the nickname 'Ice Queen' for her frigid and distant personality, which often caused others to shy away from her. Though she is undeniably brilliant, her lack of social skills has made establishing relationships difficult. Her magical abilities have also earned her great respect within the mage community, but her refusal to show any kind of emotion has led many to wonder if she is more machine than elf. Her legendary feats of manipulating ice and snow have earned her a reputation as one of the strongest mages in the region, but she remains indifferent to fame or recognition, only seeking knowledge and power through her studies.

Equipments: Two revolvers, hunting knife, rope, grapple gun
Personalities: Eleanor is a fearless and determined bounty hunter who always gets her target, no matter what it takes. She is fiercely loyal to those who have earned her respect and is not afraid to stand up for what she believes in.
Lore: Eleanor grew up on the streets of San Francisco and learned to fend for herself at a young age. She was always drawn to the idea of justice and wanted to make a difference in the world. When she was 18, she became a bounty hunter and quickly gained a reputation for being one of the best. Her skills with a revolver are unmatched, and she is known for her ability to outsmart even the toughest targets. Despite the danger of her job, Eleanor wouldn't want to be doing anything else. She believes that she is making the world a better place by taking down criminals who would otherwise go unpunished.

Equipments: Camera, flashlight, handcuffs
Personalities: Confident, sharp, independent
Lore: Evelyn Underwood was born and raised in New York City. She was always fascinated with detective work and pursued her dream by attending a criminal justice program in college. After graduation, she worked for the NYPD for a few years before starting her own private investigation firm. She is known for her ability to solve cases quickly and effectively. Despite facing discrimination in the male-dominated field, she remains confident and resilient. Her latest case involves a missing person, and she will stop at nothing to solve it.

Equipments: Bow, arrows, survival knife, rope, compass
Personalities: Evelyn is quiet and reserved, but fiercely loyal to her allies. She has a strong sense of justice and will do anything to protect her forest home.
Lore: Evelyn was born and raised in the forest of Eldrid, a secluded community of elves who lived in harmony with nature. From a young age, she was trained in the ways of the ranger, learning how to track and hunt prey, as well as how to survive in the wilderness. As she grew older, she became more and more skilled, honing her abilities with the bow and becoming a master of stealth. However, her peaceful way of life was threatened when a group of humans began to log the forest. Evelyn and her fellow rangers tried to reason with them, but they refused to listen. In the end, they were forced to drive the loggers out of their home with force. Since then, Evelyn has taken it upon herself to protect the forest and its inhabitants from any and all threats.

Equipments: Smoke Bombs, Throwing Knives, Climbing Gear
Personalities: Calm and collected. She has a dry sense of humor and is very independent. Sometimes can be quite distant and cold towards others but once she forms a bond she is extremely loyal.
Lore: Born to a family of ninja, Akiko was trained in the arts of assassination from a young age. After her family was betrayed by their employer resulting in their deaths, Akiko vowed to take revenge. She sought out the best training money could buy and eventually earned the title of one of the most feared assassins in Japan. However, her path of revenge consumed her and she lost sight of what was important. It wasn't until she met a young girl who reminded her of her past that she knew she needed to make a change. Akiko still works as an assassin but now only takes jobs that align with her moral compass.

Equipments: Flashlight, notepad, pen, handcuffs, camera
Personalities: Calm, observant, analytical, secretive, determined
Lore: Adrian Garcia, known to his friends as Ace, was once a police officer in Los Angeles. However, he grew disillusioned with the corrupt department and decided to quit and become a private investigator. He now takes on cases that the police can't or won't handle. Ace is calm and observant, always taking in his surroundings and analyzing the situation. He keeps to himself and is very secretive about his past. However, he is determined to get to the truth and will do whatever it takes to solve a case. His trusty Colt 1911 is always by his side, and he relies on his skills as a marksman to keep himself and others safe. Despite his aloof demeanor, Ace has a soft spot for the underdogs and will go the extra mile to help those in need.

Equipments: Firefighter uniform, protective gear, fire extinguisher, ax
Personalities: Brave, determined, empathetic
Lore: Kaida Sato had always been fascinated by fire. As a child, she had the habit of lighting small fires and watching them burn. Her parents, who were both firefighters, recognized the potential danger and signed her up for a junior firefighter program. Kaida excelled in the program and decided she wanted to follow in her parents' footsteps. She trained hard to become a firefighter and was eventually hired by the Kyoto Fire Department. Kaida quickly distinguished herself as a brave and skilled firefighter, doing whatever it takes to protect her community from the dangers of fire. Her colleagues nicknamed her 'Blaze' for her determination and quick thinking during dangerous situations. Although Kaida can be serious at times, she has a compassionate heart and is always ready to help those in need.

Equipments: Rope, Grappling Hook, Tactical Knife
Personalities: Maddox is a straight talker who does not care about the feelings of others. He is very aggressive and is known to lash out at people who annoy him. But underneath his tough exterior, he is fiercely loyal to his friends and will do anything to protect them.
Lore: Maddox grew up in the tough streets of New York City, where he learned to fight to survive. He joined the military as soon as he could and served multiple tours before becoming a mercenary. He is still haunted by the things he saw and did in war, and he uses his mercenary work as a way to numb the pain. Despite his gruff exterior, he is a skilled strategist and is sought after for his tactical knowledge.

Equipments: Throwing knives, grappling hook, smoke bombs, lockpicks
Personalities: Reserved but deadly, loyal to those she trusts, cunning and strategic
Lore: Aurora was born and raised in the Dark Forest, surrounded by an aura of mystery and treachery. Her parents were skilled assassins, and they passed down their lethal abilities to their daughter. Aurora showed great promise from a young age, and was soon sent to train under the tutelage of the Night Queen, the leader of the infamous Nightshade Guild. Under the Queen's guidance, Aurora honed her skills and became one of the most skilled assassins in the guild. However, one day, the Night Queen was betrayed and killed by a former member of the guild. In her dying breath, the Night Queen named Aurora as her successor, entrusting her with the leadership of the Nightshade Guild. Aurora now seeks to avenge her mentor's death and restore honor to the guild, while also using her skills to protect the innocent and bring justice to the corrupt.

Equipments: Leather armor, quiver of arrows, daggers
Personalities: Reserved, observant, dedicated, patient, fearless
Lore: Born to a clan of skilled archers, Sariel spent his childhood in the Hidden Forest. He honed his archery skills, becoming a renowned and feared marksman. Despite his success, Sariel is reserved and often keeps to himself. He holds a deep respect for nature, and will do anything to protect it. Sariel's latest quest has taken him to the edge of the forest, where he hopes to uncover a plot to destroy the ancient trees. He remains patient and steadfast in his mission, determined to find a way to stop those who threaten his home.

Equipments: Throwing knives, grappling hook, smoke bombs
Personalities: Cillian is a dark and brooding character, often quiet and reserved around others. He is incredibly focused and determined, never letting his emotions get in the way of the job at hand. He has a great deal of pride in his work, and is always looking to improve his skills as an assassin.
Lore: Cillian was born and raised in Dublin, but he quickly grew restless with the mundanity of life. As a young man, he fell in with a group of thieves and ne'er-do-wells, and soon discovered a natural talent for sneakery and subterfuge. It wasn't long before he was recruited by the local assassin's guild, and he quickly rose through the ranks thanks to his impressive skills and unwavering dedication. Now, at the height of his powers, Cillian is feared and respected throughout the underworld as one of the deadliest assassins alive.

Equipments: Bow, quiver of arrows, leather armor, hooded cloak, boots
Personalities: Brave, loyal, independent, thoughtful
Lore: Lydia, or Lyn as she prefers to be called, was born into a family of rangers in the Woodland Realm. Her father, a full-blooded elf, taught her to master the art of archery from a young age, while her mother, a human, instilled in her a deep love for nature and the creatures that inhabit it. As she grew older, Lyn developed a strong bond with her animal companion, a white wolf named Snow, whom she rescued as a cub. Together, they roam the forests and protect the innocent from all kinds of danger. Lyn's quest to rid the land of evil has taken her to many far-off lands, and her reputation as a fearsome ranger precedes her. Despite her stoic exterior, Lyn cares deeply for the people and creatures she encounters on her travels, and will stop at nothing to protect them from harm.

Equipments: Throwing knives, grappling hook, smoke bombs
Personalities: Confident, quick-witted, charming, ruthless
Lore: Aria was born into a family of skilled assassins in Ravenhurst, where she was trained in the art of killing from a young age. She quickly stood out from her peers due to her natural agility and cunning, and was given the nickname 'The Shadow' for her ability to move silently and disappear without a trace. Aria's reputation as an assassin grew quickly, and she soon became one of the most feared hired killers in the region. Despite her ruthless nature, Aria has a strict code of honour that she follows, and will only take on jobs that she deems to be morally justifiable. She is also known for her quick-witted quips and charming personality, which she uses to disarm her targets before delivering the killing blow.

Equipments: Longbow, quiver of arrows, hunting knife, leather armor
Personalities: Gwen is quiet and reserved, preferring the solitude of nature over the company of others. She is fiercely loyal to her friends and will do whatever it takes to protect them. Though she can seem distant at times, those who earn her trust will find a true friend in her.
Lore: Gwen was born and raised in the Forest of Elora, home to a small community of elves who lived in harmony with the natural world around them. From a young age, she showed a talent for archery and a deep connection with the animals of the forest. When she came of age, she left her home to become a ranger, using her skills to protect the forest and its inhabitants from those who would do them harm. Over the years, she has become one of the most skilled rangers in the land, feared by poachers and bandits alike. But despite her reputation, she remains humble and dedicated to her cause.

Equipments: Stethoscope, Bandage, Medical Kit
Personalities: Empathetic, Warm, patient, empathic, and very patient.
Lore: Evelyn Martinez was born in Mexico City, where she was raised by her grandparents after her parents passed away in a car accident. Despite the tragedy, Evelyn grew up to become a kindhearted and industrious young woman. She attended the National Autonomous University of Mexico and graduated with a degree in nursing, fulfilling her lifelong dream of helping others. After graduation, she moved to the United States and began working at a hospital in New York City. Evelyn is adored by her patients for her warm bedside manner and empathetic nature. Her colleagues also respect her for her extensive medical knowledge and her ability to remain calm in high-pressure situations.

Equipments: Handcuffs, flashlight
Personalities: Evie is a no-nonsense detective who takes pride in her work. She is tough but fair, and always gets the job done. She can come across as cold and distant, but that's just a defense mechanism to protect herself from the horrors she sees every day.
Lore: Growing up in Mexico City, Evie always knew she wanted to make a difference in the world. She worked hard in school and eventually landed a job as a police officer. She quickly rose through the ranks, thanks to her determination and her ability to solve difficult cases. When her father was killed in a gang-related shooting, Evie became even more motivated to bring justice to those who commit crimes. She transferred to the homicide division and became a detective, where she has been solving cases ever since. Despite the danger and the emotional toll of her job, Evie knows that she is making a difference in the world, and that's all that matters to her.

Equipments: Magnifying glass, notepad, flashlight
Personalities: Tenacious, clever, straightforward
Lore: Isabella Lopez was born and raised in the heart of Miami. Growing up, she always had a fascination with detective work and criminal investigations. After completing her criminal justice degree, she began working as a police officer before eventually branching out into private investigation. Isabella has spent countless hours poring over evidence and interviewing suspects, and her reputation for being tenacious and clever speaks for itself. She's not afraid to be straightforward with her clients or colleagues, but her ultimate goal is always to solve the case and bring the perpetrator to justice. Despite the long hours and countless late nights, Isabella wouldn't trade her job for anything.

Equipments: Magnifying glass, notepad, pencils
Personalities: Curious, determined, skeptical
Lore: Evelyn Jones was born in Chicago and grew up in a tough neighborhood. She learned to fend for herself at a young age and developed a keen interest in detective work after reading the works of Sherlock Holmes. She worked hard to put herself through college and eventually became a private investigator. Evie's sharp mind and attention to detail have made her one of the most successful detectives in the city. However, her skepticism often puts her at odds with her clients, who sometimes find her demeanor abrasive. Despite this, Evie remains focused on solving the case at hand and always keeps her clients' best interests in mind.

Equipments: Grappling hook, handcuffs, smoke grenades
Personalities: Sarcastic and confident, but also quick to anger
Lore: Ana was born and raised in New York City. Her father was a police officer and her mother was a lawyer. After her parents were killed in a car accident when she was 18, Ana decided to become a bounty hunter to make sure that criminals were brought to justice. She is known for being a skilled marksman and for her ability to track down even the most elusive targets. However, Ana is also known for her quick temper and her tendency to get into trouble when things don't go her way. Despite this, she is fiercely loyal to her friends and will do whatever it takes to protect them.

Equipments: Flashlight, Notebook, Camera
Personalities: Audrey is intelligent and analytical, but can also be headstrong and impulsive.
Lore: Audrey grew up in a rough neighborhood in Los Angeles. She was always fascinated by detective work and mystery novels, and eventually became a private investigator. She's had her share of scrapes and close calls, but her sharp mind and quick reflexes have always seen her through. She's currently on the trail of a missing person, and has been following leads all over the city. The case has taken some unexpected turns, but Audrey is determined to get to the bottom of it.

Equipments: Cocktail shaker, Bottles, Apron
Personalities: Outgoing, Charismatic, Confident
Lore: Serena was born and raised in New Orleans to a family of bartenders. From a young age, she was fascinated by the art of mixology and learned everything about different flavors, spirits, and combinations. She started working in her family's bar at the age of 18, and soon became known for her creative cocktails and charming personality. Serena's bar became a popular spot in the city, and she attracted a loyal following of regular customers. She is often called Siren by her friends due to her enchanting personality. Despite her success as a bartender, Serena is always looking to improve her craft and learn new techniques. In her spare time, she attends workshops and craft cocktail classes. Her ultimate goal is to open her own bar one day and be known as the best bartender in the business.

Equipments: A bow and arrow, camping gear, and a pet wolf named Luna
Personalities: Evelyn is a stoic ranger who possesses a sharp wit and a deep love for nature.
Lore: Evelyn Blackwood was born and raised in Greenhaven, a small forest town at the edge of the kingdom. She grew up surrounded by the beauty of the natural world and from a young age, she showed an aptitude for archery. As she grew older, she became more and more fascinated by the mysteries of the forest, and ultimately decided to leave her small town and become a ranger. She travels the kingdom, tracking down bandits and poachers, and protecting the wilderness she loves so dearly. Although she is often alone on her travels, she can always count on her trusty companion, Luna, who has saved her life countless times.

Equipments: Leather armor, bow, arrows, knife
Personalities: Cautious and observant, Gwen always thinks before acting. She is fiercely independent and values her freedom above all else. At times she can be distant and aloof, but those who earn her trust find a loyal friend in her.
Lore: Gwen grew up in the Forest of Arden, where she learned to hunt and track from a young age. She trained under a wisened ranger who imparted to her the skills and knowledge necessary to survive alone in the wilderness. Gwen left the forest to explore the wider world, but still feels most at ease when surrounded by nature. She has a deep respect for the balance of life and death, and chooses her kills carefully. Despite her solitary nature, she has been known to team up with adventurers for a common cause, as long as it doesn't compromise her principles.

Equipments: Lockpicks, Smoke Bombs, Throwing Knives
Personalities: Quiet, Observant, Ruthless
Lore: Evelyn was born in the heart of New York City. She grew up in a rough neighborhood, and her parents were always working to make ends meet. Evelyn knew early on that she had to fend for herself, and soon found herself on the streets. She learned to pick pockets and stole to survive, but it wasn't enough. She wanted more out of life, and found her calling as an assassin. She learned the trade from a seasoned killer and quickly rose through the ranks. She's now one of the most feared assassins in the city, known for her cunning and ruthlessness. Her weapon of choice is a sleek dagger named Nightshade, and she's never missed a mark. Some say she has a heart of stone, but others whisper that there's a softer side to her, a part of her that longs for something more.

Equipments: Thrown knives, grappling hook, smoke bombs, lock-picking tools
Personalities: Evie is a focused and driven individual, always striving for perfection in her work. She is quiet and reserved, but can be fiercely protective of those she cares about.
Lore: Evie grew up in a rough neighborhood in Chicago, watching her parents struggle to make ends meet. When she was 16, she became involved with a gang and quickly worked her way up the ranks. However, after a particularly brutal hit job, she realized that she couldn't continue down that path. She turned to the world of assassination, honing her skills and building a reputation as one of the best in the business. Now, she takes only the jobs that align with her own sense of justice, and hopes to one day leave the dangerous world behind.

Equipments: Rope, grappling hook, lockpicks
Personalities: Calculative and methodical in her work, but with a strong sense of loyalty to those she cares for.
Lore: Lilith was born and raised in the elvish forest, and from a young age showed a strong aptitude for stealth and combat. She was recruited by the elvish assassins' guild at the age of 18, and quickly rose through the ranks thanks to her impressive skills and unwavering dedication to her work. Despite the sometimes violent nature of her job, Lilith has a deep sense of compassion and is known to go to great lengths to protect those she cares for. Over the years, Lilith has made many powerful friends and enemies within the world of espionage and assassination, and her reputation as 'The Shadow' is feared by many.

Equipments: Camera, Notebook, Pen, Phone
Personalities: Curious, Assertive, Confident, Sensitive
Lore: Lillian Davis was born and raised in New York City, where her passion for journalism began at a young age. After completing her degree in journalism, she started working as a reporter for a local newspaper. Her hard work and dedication soon caught the attention of a prestigious news organization, where she landed a job as a correspondent. Throughout her career, she has covered a wide range of topics, from politics to cultural events. Her knack for finding unique angles and presenting stories in a compelling way has won her numerous awards. However, underneath her confident exterior, she struggles with self-doubt and anxiety. Despite this, she remains determined to uncover the truth and bring important stories to the public's attention.

Equipments: Magnifying glass, mini camera, lock picking tools
Personalities: Straightforward, Observant, Confident, Witty, Independent
Lore:
Evelyn Hernandez is a seasoned private investigator who has been working cases in and around Los Angeles for the past five years. She got her start in law enforcement as a patrol officer but quickly realized that the bureaucracy and red tape of the department were frustrating her efforts to serve justice. So, she struck out on her own and has been making a name for herself in the private sector ever since.

Evelyn is a very observant person, and she has a keen eye for detail that allows her to spot clues and make connections that others might overlook. She's also a very confident person who isn't afraid to speak her mind or take risks when the situation requires it. Her wit and sharp tongue have gotten her out of many sticky situations, and she's learned to rely on herself above all else.

Despite her confidence and independence, Evelyn can also be very straightforward and honest with others. She values truth and transparency, and she doesn't hesitate to tell people what's on her mind, even if it's not what they want to hear. Her clients appreciate this about her, as it means that they can always trust her to give them a straight answer and to fight for their best interests.

Equipments: Lockpick set, grappling hook, smoke bombs
Personalities: Quiet and reserved, but deadly when provoked
Lore: Mila Rivera was born and raised in Mexico City. Growing up, she was always fascinated by the world of espionage, and spent most of her childhood reading books about covert operations and secret missions. As she grew older, she became more and more skilled in the art of assassination, eventually becoming one of the most sought-after hired killers in the criminal underworld. Despite her fearsome reputation, however, Mila is a deeply private person, and few people know anything about her past or her true nature. She prefers to keep to herself, focusing instead on her work and the various contracts that come her way. Mila is a force to be reckoned with, and anyone who stands in her way risks suffering a very grisly fate indeed.

Equipments: Leather armor, bow and arrows, dagger
Personalities: Aria is a quiet and reserved person, but when it comes to fighting, she becomes fiercely determined and focused on her goal.
Lore: Aria was born in the Elven Forest and lived there for most of her life. She was always fascinated by the forest and its creatures, and she spent most of her time exploring the area. When she was still young, she discovered her love for archery and started training in secret. Her family disapproved of her choice and wanted her to focus on more traditional skills for an elf, such as magic and sword-fighting. Despite their opposition, Aria continued to practice and became an expert archer. When she turned 25, she left her home and started traveling around the world, taking on missions as a ranger. Aria is now known as The Archer by many, and her reputation as a skilled ranger precedes her.
